Question
========

Below is SPSS output from a regression analysis of Y on X. What percentage of the variation in Y can be explained by X, in this sample?

![](uva-simple-linear-regression-410-nl-graph01.png)

Answerlist
----------

* 13.9%
* 19.9%
* 28.8%
* 53.6%

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 13.9%: Incorrect
* 19.9%: Incorrect
* 28.8%: Correct
* 53.6%: Incorrect
